programmes.show_description: News from across Scotland and the world, plus sport, weather, entertainment and big name interviews.
Connie McLaughlin gets to the heart of the stories making the news.
News updates from Scotland and beyond, plus all your lunchtime sport, travel and weather.
Michelle McManus brings you feelgood music and chat with celebrity guests.
Len Pennie keeps you up to date on what's happening in the arts and culture scene across Scotland.
Breaking down the day's talking points with comment and opinion, plus sport, travel and weather.

programmes.show_name: Get It On with Bryan Burnett
programmes.show_description: It's the songs that have shunned the eco message - whether it's driving in the fast lane, heading off on a jetplane or life being a gas!  It's the songs that are not eco-friendly.
New Scottish music from Dead Pony and The Twilight Sad, and classic tracks from Teenage Fanclub, Kraftwerk and Franz Ferdinand, plus another Slow Club and Parallel Lines.
The best company to end the day, with lively chat and some of your favourite tunes.
Martin Geissler and the team bring you thoughtful conversation and expert analysis, covering the most interesting news stories in Scotland.
Joining Radio 5 Live.

programmes.show_name: Get It On with Bryan Burnett
programmes.show_description: What are the songs that you know the second you hear them? You've got Faith before George has taken a breath, or you've got the swagger before the Bee Gees were jive talking.
Sporting commentary, analysis and debate.
The best company to end the day, with lively chat and some of your favourite tunes.
